name: ad rees
text: Firefox 3.5 supports the HTML5 video tag ( see http://diveintohtml5.ep.io/video.html ) however it only supports video encoded as OGG (Theora/Vorbis). It looks like you'll need to use a flash based player for now at least. I would recommend going with MP4 because it's already supported on the latest version of Safari and Chrome.
